thread.title: INVESTOR ALERT: The Law Offices of Vincent Wong Launch Investigation of Ambassadors Group Inc. for Possible Breaches of Fiduciary Duty
thread.title_full: INVESTOR ALERT: The Law Offices of Vincent Wong Launch Investigation of Ambassadors Group Inc. for Possible Breaches of Fiduciary Duty - Yahoo Finance

author: The Law Offices of Vincent Wong
title: INVESTOR ALERT: The Law Offices of Vincent Wong Launch Investigation of Ambassadors Group Inc. for Possible Breaches of Fiduciary Duty
text:
NEW YORK, Sept. 18, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- The Law Offices of Vincent Wong announce an investigation of Ambassadors Group Inc. ( EPAX ) concerning violations of federal securities laws by certain officers and directors.
View photo
. Click here to learn about the case: http://docs.wongesq.com/EPAX-Info-Request-Form-907 . There is no cost or obligation to you.
The investigation concerns whether certain statements made by Ambassadors Group regarding its business and prospects were false and misleading, resulting in significant investment losses to shareholders. On July 13, 2015, after the market close, Ambassadors Group surprised investors by announcing the cessation of operations by 2015 year-end, citing declining revenues and declining travelers for several years. This news shocked the market and sent the company's shares into a free-fallâ€”losing approximately 31% in pre-market trading on July 14, 2015, from $2.40 to approximately $1.75 per share on intraday trading July 14, 2015. To obtain additional information regarding the investigation of Ambassadors Group, contact Vincent Wong, Esq. either via email vw@wongesq.com , by telephone at 212.425.1140, or visit http://docs.wongesq.com/EPAX-Info-Request-Form-907 .
Vincent Wong, Esq. is an experienced attorney that has represented investors in securities litigations involving financial fraud and violations of shareholder rights. Attorney advertising. Prior results do not guarantee similar outcomes.
